original_text: And they demolished the pillar of Baal, and demolished the house of Baal, and made it a latrine to this day.
korean_text: 바알의 목상을 헐며 바알의 신당을 헐어서 변소를 만들었더니 오늘까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: And they demolished the pillar of Baal
and demolished the house of Baal
and made it a latrine to this day
